caption: In this episode, the protagonists uncover crucial clues while investigating a murder case, involving a dormitory and some bombed houses. They find that the murder case is related to a card game, and as a result, they find themselves in danger. Highlights include the protagonists finding a dormitory suspected to be the murder scene, considering it a place of hatred, discovering the murder case is related to a card game, finding bombed houses possibly related to the murder case, suspecting that the murder is related to the card game and thereby plunging themselves into peril, determining that the murder case is related to some notorious yacht caves, associating the murder with a photographer, linking the murder to Sherlock, finding that the Mongolian Gardens on the 23rd and 24th floors have been bombed and may be related to the murder, and once again asserting that the murder case is linked to a card game, putting the protagonists in a dangerous situation.
